summary: A configuration container for a depth estimation model that encapsulates architectural choices such as backbone selection, patch size, hidden dimensions, up/downâ€‘sampling factors, and whether to load pretrained backbone weights. It inherits from a generic pretrained configuration class and is used to instantiate a DepthAnything model with the specified settings.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to easily customize and reproduce depth estimation models by specifying model architecture parameters and backbone options in a single, serializable object.
